abstract: The Upshot; Robert J Shiller Economic View column warns that 10 percent drop in United States stock market over five trading days in August may not have adequately corrected overvaluation of stocks; suggests current situation is particularly risky, and there is no telling whether stock markets will decline to historical average or whether overvaluation will continue.
lead_paragraph: There are reasons to question whether the recent sharp drop in an overactive stock market was enough, or whether a longer decline is ahead.

headline.main: Rising Anxiety That Stocks Are Overpriced
headline.print_headline: A Slap May Not Be Enough to Correct Markets

snippet: There are reasons to question whether the recent sharp drop in an overactive stock market was enough, or whether a longer decline is ahead.
